actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Small Business Act with respect to certain reporting requirements relating to Government procurement.

summary.text: Requires each department and agency of the executive branch which procures goods or services by contract to make a quarterly report to the President, the President of the Senate, and the Speaker of the House of Representatives, not less than forty-five days after the close of the quarter, showing the amount of funds appropriated to the department or agency which has been expended, obligated, or contracted to be spent with small business concerns and the amount of such funds expended, obligated, or contracted to be spent with firms other than small businesses in the same fields of operation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of the Small Business Act with respect to certain reporting requirements relating to Government procurement.
